personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United States Enterprise B2B SaaS - Revenue Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Revenue leaders at enterprise SaaS firms lack cross-team visibility into multi-quarter deals, causing forecast inaccuracy and missed revenue targets.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios centralizes deal and program status across Sales, CS, and Product, improving executive visibility and reducing forecast variance by up to 30%.

mappings.pain_point: Sales ops and GTM leaders waste time on manual handoffs between Sales and Customer Success, extending onboarding and delaying revenue recognition.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows automates sales-to-onboarding handoffs and standardizes tasks, cutting time-to-revenue by up to 20% and reducing manual triage.

mappings.pain_point: Chief Revenue Officers struggle with inconsistent playbook execution across 200–500 reps, lowering quota attainment and deal velocity.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes playbooks and templates so reps follow consistent processes, increasing quota attainment and speeding deal cycles by ~15%.

mappings.pain_point: Rev leaders can't prioritize strategic deals vs. tactical asks because program-level objectives aren't aligned to revenue goals, diluting resources.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Goals links strategic OKRs to active deals and projects, enabling revenue leaders to reallocate effort and improve win rates for target deals.

mappings.pain_point: Integrations gaps between CRM, marketing automation, and project trackers force manual updates and create stale pipeline data.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations syncs CRM and marketing signals into work plans, automating status updates and trimming manual data work by up to 50%.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue analytics teams spend weeks reconciling program spend and ROI across initiatives, delaying budget decisions and harming growth investments.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios provides real-time program budgets and progress, accelerating spend reviews and enabling faster reallocation to high-ROI initiatives.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: Global Mid-Market Marketing Agencies - Campaign Leads

mappings.pain_point: Campaign leads at mid-market agencies suffer missed client deadlines due to fragmented asset approvals and unclear ownership, risking client churn.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana for Marketing centralizes briefs, approvals, and asset status in one place, cutting review cycles and increasing on-time deliveries by ~40%.

mappings.pain_point: Creative and production teams waste hours on repetitive intake and scope-change admin, inflating project costs and reducing margin.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows automates intake and scope-change approvals, eliminating manual steps and reducing administrative time by up to 50%.

mappings.pain_point: Agency PMs lack a single view of concurrent campaigns and resource conflicts, causing overbooked teams and late launches.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios gives campaign leads a unified dashboard of active campaigns and resource load, improving resource allocation and reducing overbooking.

mappings.pain_point: Global agencies struggle to keep client-facing status updated across emails and tools, increasing QA rework and client escalations.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes status updates and client-facing timelines so teams share one source of truth, lowering rework and client escalations.

mappings.pain_point: Tool sprawl between design, CMS, and file storage creates inefficiencies when moving assets through campaign stages.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations connects Figma, Google Drive, and CMS tools into campaign workflows so assets move seamlessly and handoff time drops.

mappings.pain_point: Campaign leads have limited ability to show campaign ROI quickly, slowing renewal conversations and upsell opportunities.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios surfaces campaign KPIs and budgets for client reviews, enabling faster ROI reporting and more effective upsell discussions.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United Kingdom Large Financial Services - Ops Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Operations leaders in UK financial firms face manual, audit-heavy processes that increase compliance risk and drive up operational cost.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana for Operations documents workflows and audit trails centrally, reducing manual audit prep and lowering compliance overhead with traceable task histories.

mappings.pain_point: Distributed operations teams rely on email and spreadsheets for reconciliations, causing SLA breaches and costly remediation work.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes reconciliations and automates task assignments, cutting SLA breaches and remediation time by up to 40%.

mappings.pain_point: Regulatory change projects stall because cross-functional tasks and approvals lack clear owners and timelines, delaying implementation.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios provides program-level timelines and RACI tracking so ops leaders coordinate regulators, legal, and IT to hit compliance deadlines.

mappings.pain_point: Ops teams struggle to integrate transaction systems with operational workflows, creating data silos and manual data entry risks.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations connects banking and CRM feeds into workflows, automating status updates and reducing manual entry errors.

mappings.pain_point: Senior ops managers lack visibility into recurring process failures, increasing client remediation costs and hurting NPS.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows captures incident patterns and enforces remediation steps, reducing repeat failures and associated client costs.

mappings.pain_point: Administrative leaders in DACH healthcare systems face fragmented patient intake workflows, causing billing delays and lost revenue.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows automates intake checklists and handoffs from front desk to billing, shortening billing cycles and reducing revenue leakage.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue cycle teams spend excessive time resolving claim denials due to unclear ownership and missing documentation.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes denial workflows with attachments and owners, cutting denial resolution time and lowering rework.

mappings.pain_point: Regional administrators must prove GDPR-compliant processes across clinics but lack auditable operational trails, increasing privacy risk.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios provides centralized program views and audit-ready task histories to demonstrate compliance across sites.

mappings.pain_point: Scheduling mismatches between clinical teams and admin staff create underutilized slots and increased no-shows, reducing revenue per clinic.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations syncs scheduling and EHR updates into operational workflows so teams reduce no-shows and improve utilization rates.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling administrative processes across 50–300 staff is manual and inconsistent, driving training costs and operational variance.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows standardizes repeatable admin processes and templates, enabling scalable rollouts and reducing training time for new hires.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: North America Mid-Market Retail & Ecom - Marketing Leads

mappings.pain_point: Marketing leads at mid-market retailers miss promo deadlines because campaign calendars and merch timelines aren't synchronized, hurting sales lift.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana for Marketing unifies promo calendars with merchandising tasks, improving on-time launches and preserving expected sales lift.

mappings.pain_point: E‑commerce teams waste time reconciling inventory and creative release schedules, leading to out-of-stock promos and lost revenue.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations connects inventory and CMS systems into campaign workflows, reducing promo errors and lost revenue from stock mismatches.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-channel campaign attribution is unclear, preventing marketing leads from optimizing spend across paid, email, and social.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Portfolios aggregates campaign metrics and spend by channel for clearer attribution, enabling faster reallocation to high-ROI channels.

mappings.pain_point: Creative teams face repetitive approval loops with retailers and internal stakeholders, slowing time-to-market for seasonal campaigns.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Workflows automates approval gates and notifies approvers, shrinking review cycles and accelerating time-to-market.

mappings.pain_point: Mid-market marketing teams juggle multiple vendors and lack a single source of truth for briefing and asset delivery, increasing vendor fees.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes briefs, vendor tasks, and delivery milestones so teams reduce coordination overhead and vendor costs.
